title: Motivational Strategies for Improving Persistence in Science MOOC Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Concepts and Basic Smartphone Usage
context.additional_context: Real-time video classes in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones, with formative assessment-based learning continuity management.

learning_goals: Learners participate in real-time classes with an attendance rate of 80% or higher.
Learners demonstrate self-efficacy of 75% or higher in science task performance.
Learners provide three or more real-life application examples related to the learning topic.
Learners achieve a task completion rate of 90% or higher through peer feedback activities.

resources: Simple science experiment kit (using household materials)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
